name: Twelve Sky 3
storyline:
mainly tells the story of a forgotten era hundreds of years ago when countless lives were wiped out. After a great war between the Demon Cult and the Righteous Cult, Shenzhou fell into chaos, and countless masters died, but only ended up with a situation where both sides suffered losses.
On the night of the wedding of Wen Min, the chief disciple of the Divine Sword Sect, the assassin of the Tianlin Sect severely injured Wen Min and abducted Zhou Xuanling. Later, someone found Zhou Xuanling unconscious in the residence of the Nightmare Holy Cult. Zhou Wuji, the head of the Xiaoyao Sect, denounced Li Woxing for his shameless and despicable behavior, and then tore up the three-faction agreement signed more than ten years ago. After that, the leader of the Divine Sword Sect also condemned Li Woxing for having no reputation in the martial arts world, so the three-faction agreement that had been barely maintained for more than ten years was declared over, and the martial arts world once again entered a chaotic state of disputes and disturbances.
Just as the various sects were fighting for the secrets of Tianlin Swordsman's mind, the Demon Cult began to stir again, and finally forced the major sects of Jianghu to join forces again and jointly create the Canglong Temple as the command center to fight against the Demon Cult. But can the major sects of Jianghu today still defeat the Demon Cult without the assistance of Tianlin Swordsman? Whether the alliance of the major sects is solid under the temptation of the Demon Cult is all unpredictable.
As time passed, this situation continued for more than ten years. People with strong hearts were still fighting against the Demon Cult, but more people could not withstand the temptation of the Demon Cult and turned around and stabbed their companions in the chest with swords. The balance of strength between the righteous and the evil sects was finally broken. The army of the Demon Cult was gathering and preparing to break through the Canglong Temple in one fell swoop. The moment of the real decisive battle has arrived. Perhaps the light will eventually be swallowed up and justice will eventually be buried, but people never give up hope. The leaders of the Canglong Temple have always believed that there will always be some young people in this world who will give them the last hope and fight for hope...
summary: "Twelve Sky3" is a 3D MMORPG client game developed by BacN Network Technology (Hong Kong) Co., Limited based on "Twelve Sky2". The game uses terrain vegetation rendering technology, scene light and shadow effects, and engine effects such as SpeedTree to show the traditional martial arts world. The game UI and scene models have been optimized, and a lot of new game content has been added, including a new combat system and a new world map display. The most important thing is that the appearance of the game character model is no longer based on equipment display alone, but also adds a fashion display system. A variety of elements with Chinese cultural characteristics are integrated into the game to make the character modeling more amazing.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: '십이지천3' 두 번째 예고편 영상이 오늘 공개됐으며, 더 많은 새로운 비주얼이 순차적으로 공개될 예정이다.
